description: Kafka dashboard for metrics exported by Prometheus Operator

panels.description: Incoming message rate per topic. Omitting 'topic=(...)' will yield the all-topic rate.
panels.title: Messages in topics

panels.description: Byte in (from the clients) rate per topic. Omitting 'topic=(...)' will yield the all-topic rate.
panels.title: Byte in rate from clients

panels.description: Fetch request (from clients or followers) rate per topic.
panels.title: Fetch request rate

panels.description: Byte out (to the other brokers) rate per topic.
panels.title: Byte out rate to other brokers

panels.description: Byte in (from the other brokers) rate per topic. Omitting 'topic=(...)' will yield the all-topic rate.
panels.title: Byte in rate from other brokers

panels.description: Produce request rate per topic.
panels.title: Produce request rate

panels.description: Failed Peoducer request (from clients or followers) rate per topic.
panels.title: Failed produce request rate

panels.description: Byte out (to the clients) rate per topic.
panels.title: Byte out rate to clients

panels.description: The first offset in a partition.
panels.title: First offset partitions

panels.description: The last offset in a partition.
panels.title: Last offset partitions

panels.description: between 0 and 1, ideally > 0.3
panels.title: The average fraction of time the request handler threads are idle

panels.description: Failed Fetch request (from clients or followers) rate per topic.
panels.title: Failed fetch request rate

panels.description: The current quorum leader's id; -1 indicates unknown.
panels.title: Current Leader ID

panels.description: The high watermark maintained on this member; -1 if it is unknown.
panels.title: High Watermark

panels.description: Number of unknown voters whose connection information is not cached. This value of this metric is always 0.
panels.title: Number of Unknown Voter Connections

panels.description: The average time in milliseconds to commit an entry in the raft log
panels.title: Average Commit Latency

panels.description: The average number of records appended per sec by the leader of the raft quorum.
panels.title: Append Records Rate

panels.description: The current voted leader's id; -1 indicates not voted for anyone.
panels.title: Current Voted

panels.description: The current raft log end offset.
panels.title: Raft Log End Offset

panels.description: The average fraction of time the client's poll() is idle as opposed to waiting for the user code to process records.
panels.title: Average Poll Idle Ratio

panels.description: The number of active brokers as observed by this Controller.
panels.title: Number of Active Brokers

panels.description: The number of Active Controllers on this node.
panels.title: Number of active controllers

panels.description: The number of fenced brokers as observed by this Controller
panels.title: Fenced Broker Count

panels.description: The number of times this controller node has encountered an error during metadata log processing.
panels.title: Metadata Error Count

panels.description: The number of global partitions as observed by this Controller.
panels.title: Global Partition Count

panels.description: The number of global topics as observed by this Controller.
panels.title: Global Topic count

panels.description: The number of offline topic partitions (non-internal) as observed by this Controller.
panels.title: Offline Partition Count

panels.description: The count of topic partitions for which the leader is not the preferred leader.
panels.title: Preferred Replica Imbalance Count

title: KubeDB / Kafka / Database
